subject: 113-4574264-3497863 Amazon Order - Replacement Plus X Pedals
description_text:
Hi,

I'm writing to reply to the Amazon message. (Note the account is under
Ellen Scott, my wife)

As requested, attached please find some images of the broken part. Note
that I removed the pedal travel limiter _only_ to take pictures and to try
to insert the spring back.

As mentioned in my Amazon response, I noticed a click on the throttle a day
or two ago, and a weird dead zone. I tried to adjust the pedal travel, and
then the spring flied out and noticed the broken part.

Let me know if you need a video still.

Thank you!

Christian A. Rivera, Esq

conversations.body_text: Hi，Christian Rivera，  We sincerely apologize. Adjusting the travel to a very small range may have caused the plastic piece to collide with the blue stopper and break. We will send you a redesigned and improved throttle pedal on Monday.
